com.github.jessemull.microflexinteger.util

Class OverFlowUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jessemull.microflexinteger.util.OverFlowUtil

  • public class OverFlowUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class checks for overflow when casting a number to another type. The class provides static methods to check overflow for all Java primitives as well as two immutable data types:
    Primitives
    Byte
    Short
    Int
    Long
    Float
    Double
    Immutables
    BigInteger
    BigDecimal
    Author:
    Jesse L. Mull
